posts.title: React
posts.body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces that is declarative, efficient, and flexible.

posts.title: Next
posts.body: Next is a React framework for building server-rendered and static web applications.

posts.title: Remix
posts.body: Remix is a full-stack framework for building web applications that combines the best of React, server-side rendering, and static site generation.

posts.title: Angular
posts.body: Angular is a Typescript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular team at Google
